description:
An additional costume for Sophie: "Comfy and Casual".

Note: 
This item is available until March 10th, 2022. 
Costumes can be changed in the "Changing Room" at the desk in the atelier.
This item may become available for purchase separately at a later date.
Please visit the official website for more information.
name: Sophie's Costume "Comfy and Casual"
